name: Marjorie
desc: A Mondstadter who owns the Souvenir Shop "With Wind Comes Glory". She enjoys collecting and sharing the stories behind treasures.

customize.text: Adventure Challenge: I've Got You in My Sights

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Now, the vendors said that hilichurls with bows often show up to harass them while they're trying to ship the goods across trade routes...
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Use Elemental Skills to defeat the vulnerable Hilichurl Shooters swiftly!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The owner of With Wind Comes Glory carefully takes out a deck of cards from the Casket of Tomes, signaling for you to duel with her.

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc:
"Kätzlein Cocktail" Diona

1% energy dedicated to mixing drinks, 99% to... denying the reality of familiar.

customize.name: Jean
customize.desc:
"Dandelion Knight" Jean

Never believes that she has done well enough — not until final victory is hers, anyway.

customize.name: Rhodeia of Loch
customize.desc:
"Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

customize.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.

customize.name: Anemo Sigil
customize.desc:
An insignia that shows the recognition of the winds of Mondstadt.
Can be exchanged for special items in Mondstadt.

customize.name: Boreal Wolf's Milk Tooth
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius' wolf pack is its blessed honor guard, and even the milk teeth of a wolf cub possess great potential.
In the past, the gods had the responsibility to love all people. Andrius was therefore quite unusual in that he became leader of the wolves, while only welcoming abandoned babies and wanderers when it came to humans.

customize.name: Anemo Sigil
customize.desc:
An insignia that shows the recognition of the winds of Mondstadt.
Can be exchanged for special items in Mondstadt.

customize.name: Fetters of the Dandelion Gladiator
customize.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
It's a human thing to exaggerate a hero's story, even to the point of elevating the fetters that once bound the hero to the level of an enemy of true freedom.
As a result, these fetters were granted extraordinary powers.

customize.name: Anemo Sigil
customize.desc:
An insignia that shows the recognition of the winds of Mondstadt.
Can be exchanged for special items in Mondstadt.

customize.name: Memory of Roving Gales
customize.desc: The missing star from the Talents of an Anemo-aligned Traveler.

customize.name: Northlander Sword Billet
customize.desc:
Weapon forging material. Can be used to forge 4-star swords.
Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

customize.name: Windblume Festival Commemorative Balloon
customize.desc:
Use this to release a balloon that can be popped.
Balloons have special significance in the land of the wind, for they represent the freedom to drift with the wind. Of course, air pressure will destroy balloons once they've reached a certain height.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Windsong Lyre
customize.desc:
Use this traditional instrument from Mondstadt to play songs.
An instrument of incredible workmanship, it will surely produce moving music when played by able hands.
Mondstadt has a long-standing tradition of poetry and song, and thus also boasts a long history of constructing instruments to that effect. Bards are most proud of their songs and poems, and perhaps the instruments, too, would be proud of their owners and their musical tradition.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Wind-Blessed Harpastum
customize.desc: A harpastum made from pure bird feathers and strong fabric. Perhaps it contains some strange power...

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.
